lead_paragraph: A mass of demonstrators chanting, "Black lives matter," converged in the Mall of America rotunda Saturday as part of a protest against police brutality that caused part of the mall to shut down on a busy day for holiday shopping.

headline.main: Police Brutality Protesters Rally at Mall of America
headline.print_headline: Police Brutality Protesters Rally at Mall of America
